metadata.title: CVE-2023-34867 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Jerryscript 3.0 (commit 05dbbd1) was discovered to contain an AssertionFailure via the ecma_property_hashmap_create atjerry-core/ecma/base/ecma-property-hashmap.c.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
